Control Name: 3.7 Ensure CloudTrail logs are encrypted at rest using KMS CMKs
Control Statement: It is recommended that CloudTrail be configured to use SSE-KMS. Configuring CloudTrail to use SSE-KMS provides additional confidentiality controls on log data as a given user must have S3 read permission on the corresponding log bucket and must be granted decrypt permission by the CMK policy.
